title: Protectors of The Wood #2: Phoebe Breaks Through
description: The Protectors of the Wood adventure novel series is a fully illlustrated story of a group of misfit teenagers who save the world from climate change. In Book 2, Phoebe and her friends defend Middletown and the forest from the plans of a powerful corporation trying to uncover the source of unimaginable wealth. Phoebe's friend Abby is hunted ruthlessly by her enemies, who hope to learn the most important secret on earth. Abby's mysterious mission leads to a dangerous climax in a haunted house on the outside of town.
author: John KixMiller
